President Trump Campaign Rally in Houston, Texas
Trump held a rally in Houston for Senator Ted Cruz (R-TX), who was running for
re-election against challenger Representative Beto O’Rourke (D-TX). The
president covered a range of issues in his remarks, including border security,
trade relations with Canada and Mexico, the upcoming midterm elections, and a
proposal for a ten percent middle-class tax cut.
